_comment: Sample SignalSpec for KITT demo - US Police Wail Siren
_description: This JSON defines a frequency-modulated siren using library primitives

_modes.kitt: FM synthesis: Sine modulating frequency 380-580Hz at 2.19Hz
_modes.us_wail: Triangle wave modulating frequency 650-1500Hz over 3.6s cycle
_modes.us_yelp: Sine wave at 8Hz modulating frequency 650-1500Hz (rapid oscillation)
_modes.eu_two_tone: Square wave selecting between 525Hz and 660Hz (classic nee-naw)
_modes.cylinder: Low frequency rumble 40-120Hz with rotation envelope
